review: It's a great media player box, powerful and entertainment, but it still needs some teaks in my opinion, for example the LAN card, it is only 10/100, it could be nice that the card also supported 1000 mbits of speed for streaming, specially with HD 1080p videos.Also I understand that only support up to Dolby Digital 5.1, but what about if you have a 7.1 home theather system or even with DTS-HD, it shuld be very nice that also have it integrated. I bet that are not mayor teaks and could make of this tiny box a piace of art, very complete, everything you could imagine in one simple place.One more thing that I didn't like it and that why I am not giving to it 5 stars is that in my first days of use I got an error trying to play Amazon prime videos, I don't recall exactly the message but was something like "can't play this video at this time, please try again later", was the same message for all the Prime content. So I get in touch with Amazon customer service and after several minutes give him on the line, he prompted me to go into the Settings -> Manage Applications -> then Clear cache and memory for the Amazon Prime App and the restart it (pressing the OK and play button of the remote a the same time) and the issue was fixed. In less than a week I have done it twice which is kind of annoying and can't be happening, not acceptable.Beside that, I love it. Hopefully Amazon fix that issue soon.
